text.section:
The form of traffic citation provided for under § 1-605 of the Courts Article is a sufficient charging document for the prosecution of any offense for which a traffic citation may be issued under this title if:
It includes the information required under the laws of this State;
It is executed by the police officer issuing the citation as required under § 1-605 of the Courts Article; and
It is filed with the District Court as required under § 1-605 of the Courts Article.

The trial court may try a case for which a charge is made under this title only on:
A traffic citation that meets the requirements of a charging document under subsection (a) of this section;
A warrant, information, or indictment; or
Any other charging document authorized by a rule adopted by the Court of Appeals with the concurrence of the Administration.
